sourcesContent:
import { Dimensions } from "react-native";

const Constance = {

    //Dimentions
    height: Dimensions.get('window').height,
    width: Dimensions.get('window').width,

    //Font size
    x_small: 16,
    small: 17,
    medium: 18,
    semi_large: 20,
    large: 22,
    e_larger: 24,
    x_larger: 26,
    xx_larger: 28,

    //deviders
    smallDivider: 2,
    mediumDivider: 3,
    largeDivider: 4,

    //Theme
    Black: "#000000",
    White: "#FFFFFF",
    Blue: "#29AAE3",
    Green: "#6DA319",
    DarkBlue: "#111224",
    Yellow: "#FECE00",
    Red: "#E60707",
    Gold: "#FECD09",
    GoldDark: '#AB8A03',
    Grey: "#8E8E8E",
    GreyLighter: "#8A8A8A",
    GreyLight:'#dbdbdb',

    //dark
    dark_background: '#2E3440',
    dark_border: '#575c66',
    dark_backgroundAlt: '#575c66',
    dark_borderAlt: '#111224',
    dark_text: '#ECEFF4',
    dark_gold: "#FECD09",


    //light
    light_background: '#ededed',
    light_border: '#bdbdbd',
    light_backgroundAlt: '#eaeaeb',
    light_borderAlt: '#bdbdbd',
    light_text: '#171717',
    light_gold:'#AB8A03'
}

export default Constance;
